subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Bale scored the first of three extra-time goals on a header, after Sergio Ramos tied it in the 93rd minute, as Real Madrid beat city rival Atlético Madrid.
snippet: Bale scored the first of three extra-time goals on a header, after Sergio Ramos tied it in the 93rd minute, as Real Madrid beat city rival Atlético Madrid.
